page.title: 04Sewage 2
page.content: This produces Methane Gas Which is burnt to make the hot water needed to keep the sludge at the correct temperature. Then it is taken to a centrifuge which takes out excess water.At the same time bacteria helps purify the liquid. Water is sprayed on the filter beds to keep the bacteria in the correct climate. The liquid, which is now fairly clean water, is pumped into the river.Some of the water is removed further down the river and is processed by the Water Works for human consumption.The dry sludge is sold to farmers as fertilizer for the fields.
